entry.title: a143. Palo Santo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Abbey Press
Type: Gifts
Price: 3.50

Warmth | Love | Positive Energy
One stick of palo santo, ~ 4 inches

Meaning 'holy wood' in Spanish, palo santo is used to purify and cleanse a space.

It's said to lift the mood, inspire creativity, reduce stress, and support the immune system. Palo santo will protect your space from negative energies.

Burning palo santo: Open all windows and doorways if possible, and light the palo santo with a specific intention in mind. Let the smoke drift into every corner of the home. Palo santo will burn out on its own if left on a fire safe dish.

entry.title: a142. Essential Oils: Echo Essential Oils
entry.summary:
Vendor: Benjamin International
Type: Gifts
Price: 9.95 - 29.95 (17 variants)

PURE ESSENTIAL OILS
100% pure essential oil | aromatherapy grade | 0.3 fl. oz.

These essential oils are great to use as aromatherapy oil, massage oil, or perfume.

Aromatherapy: Place a drop of essential oil on an oil burner and heat it gently. Feel free to dilute with water as needed.

Massage: Mix essential oil with a base oil such as avocado or grape seed oil to enhance massage.

Perfume: Apply essential oil as is, or mix with a base oil or water to make it gentler on the senses. A drop of 100% essential oil goes a long way.

Keep out of reach of children.  For external use only. Dilute properly. May irritate skin. If pregnant or nursing, please consult doctor before using.

entry.title: a141. Candle: Mini Himalayan Salt Lamp with USB Plug*
entry.summary:
Vendor: WBM International
Type: Gifts
Price: 23.95

Unique salt lamp is made from Natural Himalayan salt crystals hand mined in the Himalayan Mountains Once lit the lamp will emit a calming Amber color and will switch color automatically between : Orange, Blue, Pink, Red, Green and Purple. Can be used on your desk connected to your USB port or by your side table plugged to the A/C. Heating the salt with the included LED bulb releases negative ions into the air, creating an effect similar to an ionizer, purifying the surrounding air. Due to the natural variation in Himalayan Crystal salt, weight, size, color and shape may vary.

Includes: USB cable, LED Bulb & AC adapter

Material: Himalayan Crystal Salt , Neem wood base

Finish: Natural 

*This product ships via Fed Ex.  *Excluded from "FREE" shipping due to weight/packing requirements.

entry.title: a146. Sage: Small, Medium, Large
entry.summary:
Vendor: Abbey Press
Type: Gifts
Price: 4.50 - 12.50 (3 variants)

White Sage Bundle 

  • Hand Picked, Hand Crafted, Dried, & Wrapped with 100% Cotton String
  • Fresh California White Sage (Salvia apiana)
  • Used for Spirtual Cleansing and Purification
  • Great Scent, Soothing & Robust Aroma

Small:  3.5-4 inches;  Medium 4.5-5.5 inches;   Large:  9 inches.  

 

Burning Sage

  • Plan your ritual. Decide what you are trying to accomplish by burning this sage. The practice of burning sage is ancient, rich, and steeped in cultural tradition.
  • The power of intent is integral here. If you burn sage with the intention to cleanse your home of negative energy, then it is incredibly more likely to do so. Any effect of the plant must be rooted in your mind.
  • Perhaps you want to cleanse your home of negative energy. Perhaps you wish to interact with an ancient herbal tradition and rekindle the ancient rites. Perhaps you simply want to burn incense and spruce up your home with a pleasing scent.

Understand what sage can do.

Many of the benefits are spiritual and psychological--but there is a physical component.

  • On a spiritual level: Many people use sage burning and smudging to connect with ancestral tradition. It is a common belief that the strong scent of sage can purge the negative energy from a room, a home, and a heart.
  • On a psychological level: The act of burning sage can mark a beginning, a resolution, a turning-over of a new leaf. When you accept the time-honored ritual and put your faith in the power of burnt sage, you can purge yourself of negativity and find true peace of mind.
  • On a physical level: Sage releases negative ions into the air when it is burned, and research suggests that exposure to negative ions may correlate to lower rates of depression. The strength of this correlation is still unclear, but know that sage at least has not been shown to have any negative effect.

entry.title: a136. Candle: Herbal Magic Votive Candle*
entry.summary:
Vendor: CRYSTAL JOURNEY CANDLES
Type: Gifts
Price: 6.50

Each candle has been designed with a specific intention using a unique blend of essential oils. Each candle comes with an affirmation and inspirational message. 

  • Abundance- Clove, Citronella, Lemon Balm, Cinnamon, Nutmeg. Use to attract prosperity, increase success and obtain material possessions.Use in combination with Problem Solving candle when starting a new business
  • Angel's Influence- Honeysuckle, Sweet Heather, Rose, Peppermint. Use to honor and call upon our Angels. Use in combination with Ascended Master and Guides to know you're supported and loved.
  • Creativity - Iris, Rose, Cinnamon. Use to free oneself from the burdens of the world in order to explore new dimensions, discover new thoughts, ideas and emotions.
  •  Good Health - Clove, Nutmeg, Lemon Balm, Poppy Seed, Cedar, Honeysuckle, Juniper. Use to heal the physical body. Use in combination with Harmony candle to heal pets.
  • Gratitude - Lavender, musk, clove, and cedar
  •  Healing - Cedar, Ocean, Lemon Balm, Heather. Use to heal the body, mind and soul. Use in combination with Peace to heal Mother Earth, animals and 4 elements.
  • Joy - Plumeria, Jasmine, Sandalwood. Use to discover true joy within one's being.
  •  Love - Olive Oil, Patchouli, Rose, Clove, Lavender, Dragon's Blood. Use to attract someone to you. Use in combination with Harmony to find a compatible roommate. Use in combination with Abundance candle to attract clients to your business.
  • Manifest a Miracle - Magnolia, Honeysuckle, Rose. Use to aid and enhance your love and desire. Use in combination with Angle Influence candle to manifest a miracle!!
  •  Money - Clove, Cinnamon, Nutmeg, Myrrh, Citronella, Rain. Use to attract lotteries, raises and cash. Use in combination with Abundance for business moves, career moves or starting new projects.
  •  Mother - Orange blossom, chamomile, and vanilla.
  •  Peace - Vanilla, Clove, Myrrh, Ginger Root, Caraway Seed. Use to create tranquil environment and quiet the mind. Use in combination with Harmony candle to create a loving home environment.
  •  Positive Energy - Frankincense, Dragon's Blood, Sandalwood, Saffron. Use to attract positive energy into your life. Use in combination with Good Health candle to correct nerve or muscular problems.
  •  Protection - Frankincense, Sandalwood, Rosemary, Clove. Use as protection from outside forces. Use for protection prior to a journey to ensure a safe trip. Use in combination with Problem Solving candle to find where negative energy is coming from in your life.
  •  Seduction - Musk, Patchouli, Pine, Cedar, Juniper. Use to attract a lusty relationship. Use in combination with Love candle to put a spark back into a tired relationship
  • Spirit - Sage, Lemon, Clove. Use to assist your focus on the spiritual side of life.Use in combination with Positive Energy to create success in the new millennium

 

*Excluded from "FREE" shipping due to weight/packing requirements.

entry.title: a138. Candle: Crystal Candles*
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jax Kelly
Type: Gifts
Price: 22.95

Hidden inside each candle is a crystal.  Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to balance and heal your energy.

Hand-poured and made with 100% American farmed soy wax, the natural essential + fragrance oil blend features notes of soothing lavender.

Standard 9 oz 
50 Hour Burn Time 

*Excluded from "FREE" shipping due to weight/packing requirements.  

Description provided about crystals is for information purposes only and not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any diseases.

Amethyst Quartz crystal that enhances wellness, healing, & spiritual growth.

Blue Chalcedony that radiates calming energy. Once your candle has burned retrieve your tumbled stone and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to manifest feelings of serenity.

Citrine Quartz that radiates vibes of positivity and success. Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to manifest success in all areas of life.

Dalmatian Jasper known to help keep you grounded and balanced. Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to enhance your abilities to plan, strengthen friendships and family bonds.

Moonstone that increases your intuition and connects you to the moon's energy to inspire new beginnings. Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a sacred space to bring good fortune within the flow of your life. 

Obsidian crystal that blocks negative energy. Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to shield you from negativity.

Peach Quartz that radiates peaceful vibes, so you may evoke your spiritual calm. Once your candle has burned retrieve your tumbled crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to manifest inner peace. 

Rose Quartz crystal that radiates vibes of unconditional love. Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to manifest feelings of love.

Sea Opal crystal that helps center your mind and raise your vibrations. Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to help manifest peaceful energy for your mind, body, and soul.

Tigers Eye that radiates powerful vibes to release fear and anxiety . Once your candle has burned retrieve your crystal and carry it with you, or place it in a special space to empower your self confidence.

entry.title: a138a: Pinch Me Therapy Dough
entry.summary:
Vendor: Choices
Type: Gifts
Price: 12.95 - 20.95 (16 variants)

A squishable compound that’s designed to channel relief through the senses, naturally. This placating putty was developed using the proven scientific methodology of color and scent as they relate to relaxation-all in the convenience of a portable tin. Think of it as a handy little mood-shifter.

While it can’t take away all that ails you, it can help get you back to center so you’re able to face your stressors with the clarity that comes from renewed focus. 

Please note, product images may not correlate to the size - they are to convey style.  Please see main product image to view actual size of 3oz and 10 oz jars.
